column1: Little Goat Diner////This place is AMAZING! My friend's family loved it so much they ate breakfast here every day of their trip. I was only fortunate to have one scrumptious meal at the Little Goat. Shrimp and grits were a true "cereal killer" as the menu suggests. In addition
column2: my friend and her family ordered and loved the "little piggy went to China
column4: and the fat Elvis waffles. I need to clone the menu
column6: and open my own Little Goat in Memphis pronto!
